name: nocache-bfcache
description: WordPress plugin which enables back/forward cache (bfcache) for instant history navigations even when "nocache" headers are sent.
author: Weston Ruter

scripts.format: wp-scripts format --ignore-path=.gitignore && npm run lint:js:fix && npm run lint:css:fix && composer phpcbf && composer normalize
scripts.lint: tsc && npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css && composer phpstan && npm run lint:php && npm run lint:composer && npm run lint:pkg-json && npm run transform-readme
scripts.plugin-zip: npm run transform-readme && git archive --format=zip --output=nocache-bfcache.zip --add-file readme.txt HEAD && zip nocache-bfcache.zip -d README.md
